channel.title: bullshit.land
channel.description: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

item.title: matchstick-drm
item.description:
Open “Chromecast killer” committed suicide-by-DRM

The process of adding DRM turned out to be such a clusterfuck that they had to shut down the venture altogether. They’re refunding the money they took in in pre-orders.

item.title: algorithms-character
item.description:
Using Algorithms to Determine Character

One signal is whether someone has ever given up a prepaid wireless phone number. Where housing is often uncertain, those numbers are a more reliable way to find you than addresses; giving one up may indicate you are willing (or have been forced) to disappear from family or potential employers. That is a bad sign.

Fuck off.

item.title: UofT-homeopath
item.description:
University of Toronto upholds “alternative medicine” course

The course was taught under the Anthropology department by “homeopath” Beth Landau-Halpern, who is married to the dean of the Scarborough campus, and who had been previously caught on hidden camera selling sugar pills to parents and calling them “vaccine alternatives.”

item.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
item.description: Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll’s dedicated Help repository.
